analysisEngineMetaData.name: ResolutionAnnotator
analysisEngineMetaData.description: Resolves the data produced by the KU classifier, negation detection, and PCS classifier into a single smoking status value for the given sentence. The old NominalAttributeValue objects are removed and replaced with a single NominalAttributeValue object that represents the final classification. If negation word comes along with contradiction word (set in parameter) do not negate

configurationParameter.name: ConWordsFile
configurationParameter.description: Contradiction words list. If this word appears in sentence do not negate.
